docs.lead_paragraph: A woman charged this week with tossing her newborn daughter to her death from a seventh-story window had an infant son die seven years ago, and prosecutors have now reopened their investigation into his death, authorities said Wednesday.

headline.main: Mom Accused of Tossing Newborn Girl Had Baby Son Die in 2008
headline.print_headline: Mom Accused of Tossing Newborn Girl Had Baby Son Die in 2008

docs.snippet: A woman charged this week with tossing her newborn daughter to her death from a seventh-story window had an infant son die seven years ago, and prosecutors have now reopened their investigation into his death, authorities said Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: After 25 days of winding through Europe on buses, trains, cars, a motorcycle and even a horse cart, Firas Afandi reached the end of the line: Finland.

headline.main: Finland Suddenly a Top Choice for Iraqi Asylum-Seekers
headline.print_headline: Finland Suddenly a Top Choice for Iraqi Asylum-Seekers

docs.snippet: After 25 days of winding through Europe on buses, trains, cars, a motorcycle and even a horse cart, Firas Afandi reached the end of the line: Finland.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jennifer Berry of Yonkers was charged with second-degree murder and manslaughter in the death of the infant, who was found with her umbilical cord still attached.

headline.main: Mother Is Accused of Throwing Newborn to Death From 7th-Floor Window in Bronx
headline.print_headline: Mother Is Accused of Throwing Newborn to Death From 7th-Floor Window in Bronx

docs.abstract: New York City police say Jennifer Berry of Yonkers has been charged with murder for allegedly throwing her newborn girl out seventh-floor window of Bronx apartment.
docs.snippet: Jennifer Berry of Yonkers was charged with second-degree murder and manslaughter in the death of the infant, who was found with her umbilical cord still attached.

byline.contributor: Al Baker contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ELI ROSENBERG

docs.lead_paragraph: Chicago Bulls star Derrick Rose says in a court filing that a woman accusing him of sexual battery consented to group sex and became upset because she felt she should be reimbursed for a sex toy.

headline.main: Bulls' Rose Says Woman Consented to Group Sex
headline.print_headline: Bulls' Rose Says Woman Consented to Group Sex

docs.snippet: Chicago Bulls star Derrick Rose says in a court filing that a woman accusing him of sexual battery consented to group sex and became upset because she felt she should be reimbursed for a sex toy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who apparently hid her pregnancy from her boyfriend, gave birth in his home and then tossed her newborn daughter out a seventh-story window to her death was arrested Tuesday on murder and manslaughter charges, police said.

headline.main: Mom Accused of Tossing Baby to Death From Window Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Mom Accused of Tossing Baby to Death From Window Is Arrested

docs.snippet: A woman who apparently hid her pregnancy from her boyfriend, gave birth in his home and then tossed her newborn daughter out a seventh-story window to her death was arrested Tuesday on murder and manslaughter charges, police said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.
docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tests on children go against the prevailing wisdom of counseling women to deliver preterm or even terminate pregnancy before chemotherapy.

headline.main: Study Offers Support for Cancer Treatment During Pregnancy
headline.print_headline: Study Offers Support for Cancer Treatment In Much of Pregnancy

docs.abstract: Study published in The New England Journal of Medicine finds that children who were exposed to cancer treatment during last two trimesters of their mother's pregnancy had normal cognitive and cardiac function.
docs.snippet: Tests on children go against the prevailing wisdom of counseling women to deliver preterm or even terminate pregnancy before chemotherapy.

docs.lead_paragraph: At times, there is gratification at watching a woman forcefully take on Donald J. Trump; at other times, horror at conservative policy positions.

headline.main: Liberal Feminists Ponder Friends, Foes and Carly Fiorina
headline.print_headline: Liberal Feminists Ponder Friends, Foes and Fiorina

docs.abstract: Liberal women across the United States express conflicted feelings about candidacy of Carly Fiorina, only female GOP candidate in presidential race; Fiorina has impressed many feminists with her attacks against Donald Trump, but her stances against abortion and Planned Parenthood are troubling for liberals.
docs.snippet: At times, there is gratification at watching a woman forcefully take on Donald J. Trump; at other times, horror at conservative policy positions.

docs.lead_paragraph: If the technique works in more complex animals, it would mean a noninvasive way to do basic research, and perhaps even treat brain circuits.
docs.abstract: Dr Sreekanth H Chalasani study in journal Nature Communications reports scientists have used ultrasound to activate neurons in roundworms; technique, called sonogenetics, may open door to noninvasive way to do brain research, and perhaps therapy.
docs.snippet: If the technique works in more complex animals, it would mean a noninvasive way to do basic research, and perhaps even treat brain circuits.
